name: Unreal Tournament Forums
description: CSS style update that modifies the overall look of the forum to match the look of the header and game's interface
additional_info:
Not all the pages and elements may have the updated look. If you encounter any issues, post feedback in this thread on the forums: https://forums.unrealtournament.com/showthread.php?20519-Modified-forum-style-for-Stylish

- Fixed the icons forums/subforums/thread icons
